comment: For all the th Amd US subjects of Congress that say the Federal Reserve is unconstitutional, please direct me to the clause in the Federal Constitution (corporate charter) that bars Congress, the legislative branch of US,inc from creating a central bank? I can't find it.
amr:
# ::snt For all the th Amd US subjects of Congress that say the Federal Reserve is unconstitutional, please direct me to the clause in the Federal Constitution (corporate charter) that bars Congress, the legislative branch of US,inc from creating a central bank? I can't find it.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / direct-01
            :polite +
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (ii / i)
            :ARG2 (c / clause
                  :part-of (l / law
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Federal"
                              :op2 "Constitution")
                        :ARG1-of (m2 / mean-01
                              :ARG2 (c2 / charter
                                    :mod (c3 / corporate))))
                  :ARG0-of (b / bar-01
                        :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Congress")
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (b2 / branch
                                          :ARG0-of (l2 / legislate-01)
                                          :part-of (c4 / country
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "US")))))
                        :ARG2 (c5 / create-01
                              :ARG0 g
                              :ARG1 (b3 / bank
                                    :mod (c6 / central)))))
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown))
      :snt2 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (f / find-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (ii3 / it)))
      :snt2 (s / subject
            :poss (g2 / government-organization
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "Congress"))
            :mod (a2 / all)
            :mod c4
            :name (n5 / name
                  :op1 "America"))
      :ARG0-of (s2 / say-01
            :ARG1 (c7 / constitutional
                  :polarity -
                  :domain (g3 / government-organization
                        :name (n6 / name
                              :op1 "Federal"
                              :op2 "Reserve")))))

comment: Using the word 'retarded' is offensive to the mentally disable since its a direct attack to their disability. Refrain from such words.
amr:
# ::snt Using the word 'retarded' is offensive to the mentally disable since its a direct attack to their disability. Refrain from such words.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / offend-01
            :ARG0 (u / use-01
                  :ARG1 (w / word
                        :ARG1-of (r / retard-01)))
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG1-of (d / disable-01
                        :mod (m2 / mental)))
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (a / attack-01
                        :ARG0 u
                        :ARG1 (d2 / disability
                              :poss p)
                        :ARG1-of (d3 / direct-02))))
      :snt2 (r2 / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (w2 / word
                  :mod (s / such))))
